name: Millwars (2017)
description:
In this moba, you will play as an animal hero that will fight to destroy first the enemy farm.

This prototype was made during an university course called "Online game design" in UNIMI (2017).

The project was made by 3 person in 3 months.

I made the minions (model/rigging/animation), animated the bear, made the AI for the minions, their Multiplayer part and also the lobby menu.
